It's been a fruitful year for our boy at SL, which is a wonderful community of great teachers, amazing friends & lovely aunties. Always felt welcome from the beginning & constantly inspired by the patience & love from the teachers & aunties. Forever grateful that he is surrounded by such great vibes at school everyday. Love the monthly learning themes & daily photo updates.

We've been to many outings like swimming, movie, visiting friend's home, supermarket shopping, Bouncy Paradise, Singapore River Cruise, Bird Paradise & Halloween Trick or Treating. It's always a joy to be able to join them as a parent & witness how they are never afraid to bring the children out despite the struggles.

He has also enjoyed parties at school like pajama movie, festival celebrations & birthday celebrations and had regular barber visits. There was also a pet dog & cat invited for interaction with the children, which our pet dog was also invited & she also had a great time playing with them.

He has progressed so much on sensory, self regulation & ADLs like dressing & toileting. He has also improved so much on his handwriting, cutting & academic skills.

Forever grateful to Sherwin & Thet for creating this SL family, which we are so proud to have been a part of & will always have a special place in our hearts!

All the best to you, I'm sure you will continue to help many more children to reach their full potential!

My Daughter was having issues learning to read at age 6 and 7. Mr. Sherwin and his staff were able to help her and identify a visual perception issue and my daughter was able to get past this and can now read very well. They really care and do the best anyone can to help kids. Just an amazing group of people. Anyone with a child that has any issues with learning or progressing should get their help!

Our kid is going to this center for past 6 months, we notice progressive changes in her behavior. Teachers are very friendly and they listen to our concerns and comments. They also help to setup individual goal for children based on parents priority and work towards that. The monthly progress report is detailed enough.
Mr. Sherwin is a trust worthy person to whom you can have comfortable and worry free consulting for your child's future.
Thanks to every teachers working here.
